column6: HARD LESSONS PART 3 It's the senses-shattering sixtieth issue! But for Wolverine and Storm, there's no time for celebration! They're about to take on an all-new threat to the Ultimate Universe...Lady Deathstrike!
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
